      • addYToYuv422

        public static int addYToYuv422(byte[] src,
                               int pixel_num,
                               int y_value,
                               byte[] dst)
        YUV422数据添加Y分量【YUV422 data adds Y component】
        Parameters:
        src - source image frame
        pixel_num - pixel number of source image frame
        y_value - every pixel add y_value to Y component
        dst - [out] image frame after add y_value
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult YUV422 array add a Y value

      • cutRawData

        public static int cutRawData(byte[] raw_data,
                             int image_byte_size,
                             int temp_byte_size,
                             byte[] image_data,
                             byte[] temp_data)
        原始图像+温度数据切分【Original image + temperature data segmentation】
        Parameters:
        raw_data - raw data frame from device
        image_byte_size - image_byte_size of image frame
        temp_byte_size - temp_byte_size of temperature frame
        image_data - [out] image frame after cut
        temp_data - [out] temperature frame after cut
        Returns:
        see LibIRProcess.IrporcResult Cut the raw frame to image and temperature frames
